Plot: Adèle's life is changed when she meets Emma, a young woman with blue hair, who will allow her to discover desire and to assert herself as a woman and as an adult. In front of others, Adèle grows, seeks herself, loses herself, and ultimately finds herself through love and loss.
Writer: Abdellatif Kechiche (scenario,  adaptation and dialogue), Ghalia Lacroix (scenario,  adaptation and dialogue), Julie Maroh (adapted from: the comic book "Le Bleu est une couleur chaude" by)
Actors: Léa Seydoux, Adèle Exarchopoulos, Salim Kechiouche, Aurélien Recoing
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 84 wins & 94 nominations.
Title: Blue Is the Warmest Color
